entries.title: Goodbye to Qi; The new Qi2 wireless charging standard is coming in late 2023
entries.description: Out with the old, in with the new.

entries.title: Intel’s 13th-gen mobile processor delivers the first 24-core laptop CPU
entries.description: Intel revealed its top-shelf chip, as well as the rest of its 13th-gen lineup.

entries.title: Apple’s mixed reality headset could have a waist-mounted battery
entries.description: The waist-mounted battery was a controversial design choice among Apple engineers.

entries.title: The LG Gram Ultraslim notebook is the company’s thinnest laptop ever
entries.description: It takes "thin and light" to a new level.

entries.title: January 2023 Android security patch here for Pixels
entries.description: Get your vulnerabilities fixed with this latest update, the first for 2023.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 40 Series laptop GPUs are ready for PC gamers this February
entries.description: We are looking at three times the performance of Nvidia's older laptop GPUS.

entries.title: The new Homey Pro aims to be the one smart home hub you need for everything
entries.description: It does pretty much everything and is available for pre-order now.

entries.title: Leaked video may give us our first hands-on look at the Pixel 7a
entries.description: The video seems to confirm a few details about the Pixel 7a.

entries.title: Acer Swift Go notebooks bring OLED displays in light-and-thin chassis
entries.description: This is Acer's new thin-and-light laptop design.

entries.title: From budget to high-end, Dell’s latest gaming laptops cover every need
entries.description: These new gaming laptops all offer Geforce RTX 40 series GPUs, but what else should you know?

entries.title: The new ADT Plus app will let Google Nest cam owners set up their own devices
entries.description: Installing and using smart video cameras and more should be easier with the app.

entries.title: Fossil announces Gen 6 Hybrid Wellness Edition with 2-week battery life
entries.description: The Gen 6 Hybrid Wellness Edition is expected to go on sale this Thursday.

entries.title: What is the Inbox Zero method and how does it work?
entries.description: Will it make you feel better, or is it the fast track to burning out?

entries.title: The GE Cync smart home products you already own probably won’t get Matter
entries.description: Instead, GE will launch new Matter-powered versions of some of its products.

entries.title: Dell unveils second-gen Concept Nyx, the gaming controller of the future
entries.description: Dell set out to solve a lot of the modern problems people have when it comes to gaming controllers.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy A34 5G specs leak: Where are the upgrades?
entries.description: The Galaxy A34 5G is shaping up to be a Galaxy A33 5G with minor tweaks.

entries.title: Daily Authority: 👀 Samsung’s early CES surprises
entries.description: Plus a Samsung Galaxy A54 leak, OnePlus 11 pre-launch deets, money off Fitbit Premium, upcoming video game events, and more.

entries.title: Google’s Pixel Fold production plans hint at Q4 launch
entries.description: This differs from our previous info, which pointed to an April/May launch window.

entries.title: Samsung made a laptop display that folds and slides at the same time
entries.description: The Flex Hybrid has a foldable design on the left and slidable tech on the right.

entries.title: Fitbit Premium is 60% off right now for a limited time!
entries.description: The annual Fitbit Premium plan is available right now for just $31.99.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy A54 specs leak: What to expect from Samsung’s bread and butter
entries.description: From the chipset to the display and beyond, here's what these apparent Galaxy A54 specs tell us.
